meanings.definition: relating to or containing lipoic acid
meanings.sent1: The lipoic acid supplement is good for health.
meanings.sent2: Her skincare cream contains lipoic acid for a youthful glow.
meanings.sent3: The lipoic acid party favors were a hit at the event.
meanings.sent4: His lipoic acid knowledge is as sharp as a sword.
meanings.sent5: The lipoic acid benefits are like a secret weapon for your body.

meanings.definition: of or relating to the lipid layer of a cell
meanings.sent1: The lipoic layer protects the cell like a shield.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the lipoic membrane of the cell closely.
meanings.sent3: The lipoic cell layer was the hero in the biology experiment.
meanings.sent4: Her knowledge of the lipoic cell layer was as deep as the ocean.
meanings.sent5: The lipoic layer of the cell is like a fortress defending the nucleus.

meanings.sent1: Her diet includes lipoic foods for a balanced nutrition.
meanings.sent2: The doctor explained the importance of lipoic intake for health.
meanings.sent3: The lipoic fats in the recipe made the dish extra delicious.
meanings.sent4: His understanding of lipoic fats is as clear as a sunny day.
meanings.sent5: The benefits of lipoic fats are like a treasure trove for the body.
